title: [Wii]Barbie.Horse.Adventures.Riding.Camp[PAL][ScRuBBeD].wbfs
description:
Title: Barbie Horse Adventures Riding Camp
Genre: Adventure        
Platform: Nintendo Wii
Region: PAL
File Type: WBFS
Scrubbed: Yes (Game Partition Only)


About this game:
Embark on an amazing summer adventure at the Roberts Stables. While learning to groom, feed and care for your horse, you'll take on riding lessons across five different equestrian disciplines. Explore a vast island, undertake time trials and join in fun tasks like gathering blueberries for a slumber party at the bunkhouse. You'll train, ride and jump up to five different horse breeds, help out the local islanders with their chores, unlock stylish new riding outfits, and earn medals and ribbons for outstanding performances.    


NOTE: To play this game you need a chipped or soft modded Wii.

To install & play off disc:
1. Download Wii Backup Manager -> <a href=" http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=188295" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=188295</a>  
2. Use Wii Backup Manager to convert .wbfs file to an .iso file
3. Burn .iso to DVD-R (lowest speed)
4. Enjoy!

To install & play off WBFS Partition on USB Drive or SD card:
1. Download Wii Backup Manager -> <a href=" http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=188295" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=188295</a>  
2. Use Wii Backup Manager to add .wbfs file to your partition.
3. Enjoy!

To install & play off FAT32/NTFS Partition on USB Drive or SD card:
1. Download and install Configurable USB Loader -> <a href=" http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=147638" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://gbatemp.net/index.php?showtopic=147638</a>  
2. Create a WBFS folder in the root of your FAT32/NTFS Partition.
3. Copy the torrent download into the WBFS folder
4. Use Configurable USB Loader to play
5. Enjoy!

Cheers
